channel.title: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page
channel.description: hey can any one tell me how to do it , i mean i *know how to do it* but it always says that my server is'nt up so can any one tell me how to do it right?

item.title: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page
item.dc:creator: @11139 °±²³
item.description:
@11139 wrote:

Make SURE you type in the adress that you posted in no-ip

Also, when making a no-ip Ip. You want to make sure the ip it says and your ip are the same. It should say your ip when you log into no-ip Goodluck, hope this helped!

Read full topic
item.source: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page

item.title: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page
item.dc:creator: @Raziel Raziel
item.description:
@Raziel wrote:

what i mean is…eric owner2 is that i dont correctly know how to make my no-ip work i have one but i dont know how to make it work,and is that why i cant post my server? because it dosent work?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page

item.title: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

Even though you created an no-ip, if you and you’re brother have the same ip address you guys both use 127.0.0.1 as you’re “server:”.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page

item.title: Help with posting my server on moparscape serverstatus page
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

Go all the way at the bottom of the page there will be an option “add you’re server” or somthing like that. =S.
you might have not activated you’re server. Go to www.no-ip.com.

Read full topic
